name: OldTimeRadiov2
0:
”Alexa, start Old Time Radio”
”Alexa, ask Old Time Radio to play Comedy”
”Alexa, ask Old Time Radio to play The Life Of Riley”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: old time radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Turn back the time and enjoy radio shows from a bygone era. Featuring vintage adverts, this skill transports you back to the early days of radio.

Enjoy classic radio shows like Whispering Streets - a 1950's radio soap drama, Sherlock Holmes - that unforgettable detective, or enjoy some laughs with The Life Of Riley. Whatever your taste in shows, you're sure to find it on Old Time Radio.

Not sure what to play? No problem. Just ask Old Time Radio to play a genre.
The genres available are: Horror, Comedy, Drama and Various.

Here's a couple of examples, just to get you started:
 "Ask Old Time Radio to play Comedy"
 "Ask Old Time Radio to play Father Knows Best"

During playback:
 "Next" or "Previous" - cycle through episodes

⭐ Premium ⭐ 
The premium version of Old Time Radio removes the announcement between shows, enables playback of specific episodes and also enables resuming a show - even after playing another audio skill. The touch-controls Next/Previous are also enabled in Premium for devices with a display.


If you have any feature requests, or to report any problems - please email: admin@hanicajo.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
